矑字的基本解释

矑
lú
瞳人；亦泛指眼珠：“扬清矑，隐皓齿。”
视。

矑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lú］
［《廣韻》落胡切，平模，來。］
瞳子，眼珠子。

矑字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　矑； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页820第29
【廣韻】落胡切【集韻】【正韻】龍都切【韻會】籠都切，?音盧。【玉篇】視也。　又【廣韻】目童子也。通作盧。【揚雄·甘泉賦】玉女亡所，眺其淸矑。【漢書】作盧。

矑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
矑字的起名意思

暂无。

矑
Basic explanation of words
矑
lú
Pupil; also refers to the eyeballs in general: "Yang Qingzhen, concealed white teeth."
Depending on.
矑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lú]
["Guangyun" Luo Huqie, flat model, come. ]
Pupils, eyeballs.
矑
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Title Department] 　矑; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 820 29
[Guang Yun] Luo Hu cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Long Du cut [Yun Hui] Cage cut,? Yin Lu. [Jade articles] See also.　[Guangyun] Muzi also. Pass for Lu. 【Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu】The place where the Jade Girl died, overlooking the chase. [Hanshu] As Lu.
